text: Minister of Finance and Mass Media Mangala Samaraweera met the representatives of the Chamber of Provincial Entrepreneurs at the Ministry of Finance and held discussion to iron the difficulties faced by them, yesterday (28).The representatives briefed Minister Samaraweera on issues faced by them especially with regard to the calculation of taxes. They also stressed on issues regarding the payment of VAT and other taxes my small time business entreprenuers.Finance Minister Samaraweera stated that the Treasury intends to rectify issues faced by small business owners with regard to the calculation and payment of taxes through the next budget.State Minister of Finance, Hon. Eran Wickramaratne and Secretary to the Treasury, Dr. R.H.S. title: Finance minister meets provincial entrepreneurs to iron out their difficulties
